channel.title: Collision of Ideas on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Collision of Ideas on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Efforts to Ground Physics in Math Are Opening the Secrets of Time
item.description: By proving how individual molecules create the complex motion of fluids, three mathematicians have illuminated why time can’t flow in reverse.
